abstract: Medtronic, a maker of medical devices, said Friday that it would buy Kyphon for $3.9 billion to expand its spinal treatment business. Its offer of $71 a share in cash represented a 32 percent premium to Kyphon’s closing stock price Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Medtronic, a maker of medical devices, said Friday that it would buy Kyphon for $3.9 billion to expand its spinal treatment business. Its offer of $71 a share in cash represented a 32 percent premium to Kyphon’s closing stock price Thursday.

headline.main: Medtronic to Buy Kyphon for $3.9 Billion
